Author: karentakethekids
Text: Dude, imma tell you one thing that you probably already know but, you will never feel like you are sick enough to get help. Even if u would b chillin with a bmi of 10 and zero hair, you would still think that you are not sick enough. So please, dont be so harsh on yourself and reach out for help. A life with an eating disorder is probably one of the most lamest and unfullfilling ways one could spend it. Wanna know a depressing fact? In the three years i have been in this hell i have ruined my digestion, my immune system and my thyroid. And the saddest part is that i am aware of the fact that i will continue ruining my health if i will continue and am not planning to stop any time soon
